t:
Before going to bed I go around my house and make sure to lock all the doors and windows.




As I lay in bed, I hear a voice whisper, “Well done!
                    Now we're locked in for
                                the night.”
c:
I was alone tonight. Am I now?



It’s a #lonelynight and the stars have something to say. Collab & share the plight of the lonely night. #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





#lock #voice #bed #sleep #intruder #ghost
